pr_title: Fix the mandatory fields bug in moderation

timeline.message: Fix the mandatory fields bug in EditInWizard and SaveAndContinue

Consolidate EditInWizard and SaveAndContinue validation

By inserting a function to WizardCommand.java. Note: The
RootWizardSection validation could not be consolidated with this,
as they do not share common inheritance.

Update vanilla institution to support the new test

Involved adding users and roles,
a new collection and changing permissions.
Remove unnecessary files from institution so it will import properly
Remove unnecessary files from institution so it will import properly

Start in old UI

This institution was starting in the old UI. This messes up some tests.

timeline.bodyText: Seeing this is matching DATE you should derive it from DATE even if that's storing it in a constant.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: Good to see the use of constants, but that sure is a lot. Keep in mind you only need them if you're using a value more than once. Also, for a big block like this best to sort them, and if they're related group them into (sorted) blocks. (A good example of this was just trying to find RADIO2 after I'd already found RADIO1.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.bodyText: Be worthwhile in this case to add JavaDoc to the class which has a link off to the GitHub issue.
timeline.author: edalex-ian

timeline.message: Add JavaDoc to the test and tidy up the constants
